General

Icons

These icons are used throughout the site.

Usage:

Import the icons macro.

Call the .get() function passing it the icon name.

(Optional) The second argument is any classes you would like to apply to the svg element.

Example:

{% import '@nitflex_theme/icons/icons.twig' as icons %}
{{ icons.get('facebook', 'icon icon--facebook') }}

This will render the svg inline with whatever class or classes are passed as the second argument.

<svg aria-hidden="true" role="img" class="icon icon--facebook">...</svg>

Colors

All Sass color variables prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

Primary

$color-pacific-blue
#0099cc
$color-rio-grande
#c4d600
$color-oslo-gray
#888b8d
$color-white
#FFF
$color-black
#000

Grays

$color-tundora
#464646
$color-silver
#bbb
$color-alto
#ddd
$color-gallery
#eee
$color-alabaster
#f7f7f7
Markup Details
                            <h3>Primary</h3>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #0099cc">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-pacific-blue<br>#0099cc</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #c4d600">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-rio-grande<br>#c4d600</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #888b8d">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-oslo-gray<br>#888b8d</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #FFF">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-white<br>#FFF</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #000">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-black<br>#000</div>
</div>
<h3>Grays</h3>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #464646">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-tundora<br>#464646</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #bbb">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-silver<br>#bbb</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #ddd">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-alto<br>#ddd</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #eee">
  <div class="kss-swatch__hex">$color-gallery<br>#eee</div>
</div>
<div class="kss-swatch" style="background-color: #f7f7f7">

Typography

Custom fonts are loaded via Google fonts.

Base

font-stack-base

Open Sans
Open Sans italic
Open Sans
Open Sans italic

Secondary

font-stack-secondary

Montserrat
Montserrat italic
Montserrat Bold
Montserrat Bold italic
Montserrat Black
Montserrat Black italic
Markup Details
                            <h2>Base</h2>
<p><code>font-stack-base</code></p>
<div style="font: 20px/2 'Open Sans'"> Open Sans</div>
<div style="font: italic 20px/2 'Open Sans'"> Open Sans italic</div>
<div style="font: 700 20px/2 'Open Sans'"> Open Sans </div>
<div style="font: 700 italic 20px/2 'Open Sans'"> Open Sans italic </div>
<hr />
<h2>Secondary</h2>
<p><code>font-stack-secondary</code></p>
<div style="font: 20px/2 'Montserrat'"> Montserrat</div>
<div style="font: italic 20px/2 'Montserrat'"> Montserrat italic</div>
<div style="font: 700 20px/2 'Montserrat'"> Montserrat Bold</div>
<div style="font: 700 20px/2 'Montserrat'"> Montserrat Bold italic</div>
<div style="font: 900 20px/2 'Montserrat'"> Montserrat Black </div>
<div style="font: 900 italic 20px/2 'Montserrat'"> Montserrat Black italic</div>
